ST08-001.name: Monkey D. Luffy ST08-001
ST08-001.effect: [Your Turn] When a Character is K.O.'d, give up to 1 rested DON!! card to this Leader.

ST08-002.name: Uta ST08-002
ST08-002.effect: This Character cannot be K.O.'d in battle by Leaders. [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2 cost during this turn.

ST08-004.name: Koby ST08-004
ST08-004.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.

ST08-005.name: Shanks ST08-005
ST08-005.effect: [On Play] You may trash 1 card from your hand: K.O. all Characters with a cost of 1 or less.

ST08-006.name: Shirahoshi ST08-006
ST08-006.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −4 cost during this turn.

ST08-008.name: Higuma ST08-008
ST08-008.effect: [On Play] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2 cost during this turn.

ST08-009.name: Makino ST08-009
ST08-009.effect: [On Play] If there is a Character with a cost of 0, draw 1 card.

ST08-013.name: Mr. 2 Bon Kurei (Bentham) ST08-013
ST08-013.effect: [DON!! x1] At the end of a battle in which this Character battles your opponent's Character, you may K.O. the opponent’s Character you battled with. If you do, K.O. this Character.

ST08-014.name: Gum-Gum Bell ST08-014
ST08-014.effect: [Main] You may add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −7 cost during this turn. [Trigger] Add up to 1 black Character card with a cost of 2 or less from your trash to your hand.

ST08-015.name: Gum-Gum Pistol ST08-015
ST08-015.effect: [Main] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less. [Trigger] Draw 1 card.
